relation: Add printer applet for viewing print jobs and printer auto-configuration.
binary/hex editor (successor to KHexEdit). Move from playground/utils.
enable extract-strings tool and add copy
add support for memory mapping of files
more explicit titels for undo/redo actions, also from filters
add support for blocking processes like printing, string search or filter
Replace it by a Plasmoid (in the desktop bar and on the desktop
Integrate Kross and be able to write Karambas using Python, Ruby and JavaScript
